location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to Lieutenant John Michael Guy, Commander of the Honourable Company Cruiser, the Psyche

mods.abstract: In this letter James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, acknowledges the receipt of John Michael Guy's letter, dated 4 January, which included a list of camaliens [camelines] required for the use of the Psyche'screw. Dow responds by stating that the camaliens have been shipped on board the Honourable Company cruiser, the Teignmouthfor the purpose of being conveyed to Keshme [Qeshm].
